message.content: {"id": "14047", "title": "Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap", "description": "", "OB": "When using StyledText and performing a text change with word wrap enabled, there is an issue with the redraw process that leads to inefficient redraws. This can result in multiple redraws for each visible line, causing performance issues when there are frequent text changes.", "EB": "This issue should be fixed so that there is at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line. To reproduce this issue, please run the test case provided below.", "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '14047', 'title': 'Bug 14047StyledText  inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'This should at a maximum only be one redraw for eachvisible line.Run the test case below to reproduce. ', 'SR': ''}
